[USER COMPENSATION OUTCOME]Dear Driver We would like to inform you that we have concluded the investigation for the order below:Order ID: 158247336682Finding: Item was found to be delivered to an incorrect drop off locationbased on the proof of delivery photo submitted and the photo of the actual unit from the intended  recipient  the units were not identical.compensation based on the cost of the item that had been wrongly deliveredOutcome: Wallet deduction of $200Please ensure that there is sufficient balance in the driver wallet for the wallet deduction.
